cards.name: Bilbo Baggins
cards.bio: A reluctant hobbit setting out on an unexpected journey.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Bilbo Baggins from The Hobbit holding Sting

cards.name: Gandalf
cards.bio: A wise wizard guiding the group with his powerful magic.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Gandalf the Grey with his staff in The Hobbit

cards.name: Thorin Oakenshield
cards.bio: The brave Dwarf prince seeking to reclaim his homeland.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Thorin Oakenshield with Orcrist sword from The Hobbit

cards.name: Kili
cards.bio: A young dwarf warrior, nephew to Thorin and skilled archer.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Kili the Dwarf readying his bow in The Hobbit

cards.name: Fili
cards.bio: Brother of Kili, known for his fighting prowess and loyalty.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Fili the Dwarf with his swords from The Hobbit

cards.name: Balin
cards.bio: The eldest of the dwarves, wise and counsellor to Thorin.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Balin the Dwarf from The Hobbit with his walking stick

cards.name: Dwalin
cards.bio: A fierce warrior and loyal to Thorin, brother to Balin.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Dwalin the Dwarf in battle gear from The Hobbit

cards.name: Oin
cards.bio: A dwarf with healing skills and part of Thorin's company.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Oin the Dwarf with his ear trumpet in The Hobbit

cards.name: Gloin
cards.bio: Father of Gimli and member of Thorin's company, skilled with an axe.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Gloin the Dwarf ready for battle in The Hobbit

cards.name: Bofur
cards.bio: A cheerful dwarf who wears a distinctive hat and plays the flute.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Bofur the Dwarf smiling with his hat in The Hobbit

cards.name: Azog the Defiler
cards.bio: The fearsome orc chieftain and the main antagonist, seeking vengeance against Thorin.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Azog the Defiler, the pale orc with his arm blade from The Hobbit
